properties.entry: SELECT DO_NO , DO_TITLE , DO_WRITEDATE , MEM_NO , DO_COUNT FROM DONATION D JOIN MEMBER M USING(MEM_NO) ORDER BY DO_WRITEDATE DESC
SELECT DO_NO , DO_TITLE , DO_CONTENT , DO_WRITEDATE , DO_ADMISSION , MEM_NO , REF_TYPE , DO_COUNT FROM DONATION D JOIN MEMBER M USING(MEM_NO) ORDER BY DO_WRITEDATE DESC
